attributes.action: stop plans for Universities to increase their tuition fees
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many University Chancellors want University tuition fees to rise to atleast £5-7k. Many of the chancellors even want there to be no cap on tuition fees. Please sign this petition if you are opposed to this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
